sentences.en: a car with a macho image
Body building — that's a bit macho, isn't it?
sentences.cn: 健美——挺有男子气概的，不是吗？
这个低调的男人~男人!超级男人!

sentences.en: He emerged with a macho swagger.
sentences.cn: 他大摇大摆地走了出来.

sentences.en: He was an extremely macho man.
sentences.cn: 他是个很大男子主义的人。

sentences.en: He was big and bluff and macho.
sentences.cn: 他个头很大,说话直率,而且很有男子气.

sentences.en: He's too macho to ever admit he was wrong.
sentences.cn: 他太大男子主义了，从不认错。

sentences.en: He’s sick of being cast as the hard macho man in films.
sentences.cn: 他对在电影里扮演硬汉已经厌倦了。

sentences.en: Her new boyfriend is really macho.
sentences.cn: 她的新男友实在有男子气概.

sentences.en: Here is a mysterious castle of macho pinch.
sentences.cn: 这里也有神秘的马丘比丘城堡.

sentences.en: I find feminine men very virile and macho men very fragile.
sentences.cn: 我发现阴柔的男人都非常有男子气概,而阳刚的男人则非常脆弱.

sentences.en: I know he's not the macho sort to make light of injuries.
sentences.cn: 我知道他不是那种对受伤毫不在乎的男子汉.

sentences.en: Our gym coach a beefcake a lot of macho.
sentences.cn: 教练是个很有男子气概的猛男.

sentences.en: She likes to date macho guys.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢跟有男子气概的人约会.

sentences.en: Some of these guys can be real macho headbanger s.
sentences.cn: 这里的某些人准是真正的胆量十足的狂人.

sentences.en: This is a real macho ah!
Truck drivers have a reputation for being macho and tough.
sentences.cn: 卡车司机素有强壮和吃苦耐劳的美名.

trans.tran_en: behaving in a way that is traditionally typical of men, for example being strong or brave, or not showing your feelings – used humorously or in order to show disapproval
